titleStmt.title: An act for the explaining of some doubts arising upon an act intituled, An act for the better execution of His Majesties gracious declaration for the settlement of His kingdom of Ireland and satisfaction of the several interests of adventurers, souldiers, and other his subjects there; and for making some alterations of, and additions unto the said act, for the more speedy and effectual settlement of the said kingdom.
Public General Acts. 1665 17 Charles II c. 2.
titleStmt.author: Ireland.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Crook, printer to the Kings Most Excellent Majestie, and are to be sold by Samuel Dancer bookseller in Castlestreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproductions of the originals in the British Library and the Cambridge University Library.
